text: Chantal Robin-Rodrigo (born August 4, 1948 in Aix-en-Provence, Bouches-du- Rhône) is a member of the National Assembly of France. She represents the Hautes-Pyrénées department, and is a member of the Radical Party of the Left. She is of Spanish origin. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Aix-en-Provence Category:French people of Spanish descent Category:Radical Party of the Left politicians Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Chantal Robin-Rodrigo
